1.title: First things first.

Shawn thought about it for a second, he didn't want to go all out as he to had a stressful week, but he knew hers was worse. "We can, but I want Chinese tonight for dinner." he texted back,

" your the best sweetie. If your a good boy maybe I will let you be on top tonight." she texted back. Shawn knew that was a lie. In this relationship, Alex was the dominate one for sure, as she had the world altering powers. Still, he loved her, and she would never do anything to harm him.

After 15 minutes, Shawn arrived to their apartment, and walked in. "I'm home babe." He said.

111.title: Scenario 1

1111.title: Scenario 1

12.content:
"Babe, I'm home." Shawn said as she entered the apartment. Taking her shoes off, she didn't hear anything "Alex? You home?" she said again. Walking down the hall to the bedroom, there was a bright flash. "Welcome home sweetie!"Alex yelled out. She tackled her down to the ground, and kissed her.

"Flashy entrance there. Guess you must have gotten bored without me." Shawn told her, as Alex helped her out.

"Well yeah. You leave me for two weeks and I get super bored." She said, starting to pout.

"I know, I'm sorry that I took that last minute business trip, but they did give me the full two weeks off I requested. We get to spend our anniversary together at least." Shawn said.

Alex started to hug her again, but Shawn could tell she was still upset. She did feel bad, as Alex had an important witch show that happened last week that she had to miss. She really wanted her to be there, but she understood why she couldn't.

"Babe, if I do the usual thing, will you forgive me?" Shawn asked her wife. Alex's eyes light up, and she looked directly at Shawn.

"You mean it? I do have some new things I need to test on humans." She asked her. Shawn said yes, as she really wanted to make it up to her. She was the love of her life after all.

"Your the best sweetie!" Alex said, as she hugged her again. Shawn wasn't the biggest on being her test subjects, but Alex can't really use this stuff on random people. Plus she knew Alex takes extra precautions when it comes to using her.

"So uh, what do did you have in mind?" Shawn asked somewhat nervously.
12.title: Girl

122.content:
